title: What is the message of Quetzalcoatl and can mankind receive it?
first_phrase: The final 200 tokens of this text are a message from Quetzalcoatl, the Lord of Two Paths, delivering a mysterious and esoteric message about transcendent self-awareness. The text speaks of the divinity's return to the people, removing foreign influences from their souls. Quetzalcoatl's message touches on the ever-changing nature of existence, with the great Serpent of the cosmos as the eternal being. The text delves into the dream state of the Serpent and notes that the plasma of the body, soul, and spirit of an individual can become one. This message leaves a lasting impression on the reader about the cyclical nature of existence and of intrapersonal harmony.

last_phrase: In the eternal now of the serpent's sleep, we find completeness in the perfect union of our body, soul, and spirit. As dreams come and go, we awaken to the pure "I am" and realize that only in the present moment, without the weight of our dreams, can we truly breathe. Perhaps we can learn from the serpent and embrace the now as it is, without the burden of our dreams and desires.
